title: why can't I complete any order/chaos missions anymore?
body: I played actively and completed the default missions (didn't buy the special ones). Now when I win games new missions don't appear ... have I completed all of them or this just a bug?

replies.body: this happened to me too i don't know why tho. the missions aren't supposed to end until 7/24 right?
No, that's how long the tokens last. The event is over.
The [**VS Event**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/events/vs-2017) officially ended on June 29th. Your tokens will last until July 24th, but missions have ended for the time being.
